p: After proving efficient transduction of the SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 pseudovirus particles into Vero-E6 cells, a simian epithelial cell line, and optimising the transduction conditions, the authors return indeed to the protease topic, and the question if transduction could be further enhanced by the addition of exogenous proteases. Yet, trypsin displays the opposite effect, leaving the question open of which enzyme would eventually help severing the S proteins in the given system.
